âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Transforms ideas into music videos â€¢ Uses OpenAI API for prompt and scene generation â€¢ Uses Runware API for image generation â€¢ Uses Suno API for music generation â€¢ Uses Supabase for database and storage
ðŸ“– Summary: Auto-MV Creator is a web application that allows users to transform their ideas into complete music videos. It leverages several APIs, including OpenAI for prompt generation, Runware for image creation, and Suno for music generation, alongside Supabase for data storage. The application requires a separate webhook deployment to handle asynchronous music generation callbacks.
